This transformation map is describing the mapping between document types applied in ORBIT and the exchange format.
For Orbit, the combinations currently (20050914) exist:
125 in 9501 la journal article 66 lalc conference in journal 747 lbra article book 334 lbra book chapter 46 lbra book chapter/article 380 lbralc abstract 3891 lbralc article book 1 lbralc book 2431 lbralc conference in book 394 lbralc conference paper 1640 lbr book 1 lc 303 lc abstract 276 lc lecture 267 lc poster 174 lc slide show 39 lc unpublished papers 35 ld bachelor thesis 5 ld doctoral thesis 660 ld master thesis 369 ld ph.d.-thesis 28 lp patent application 54 lp patent publication 66 lr lecture notes 2955 lr report 8219 pe 3324 pr 2322 prphd
This is what it should be:
in la - journal article lalc - conference in journal lbra - book chapter lbralc - conference in book lbr - book lc - abstract lc - lecture lc - poster lc - slide show lc - unpublished papers ld - bachelor thesis ld - doctoral thesis ld - master thesis ld - ph.d.-thesis lp - patent application lp - patent publication lr - report pe pr prphd
Incidentally, there are about 25000 literature records of which 85% is covered by {la,lbralc,lbr,lr}
